text: @PressSec Monday coronavirus positivity: Just 242 nationwide deaths today. 209 yesterday, 254 on Saturday. Three straight days with the lowest covid death totals since March 23rd. Yet crickets from most in media: https://t.co/78o82s7YI1 #Trump2020NowMoreThanEver    #Maga #Kaga
